IsaacExt:MucormycosisPower.NAME: Fungal Spores
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon apply, apply #b4 #yPoison to ALL enemies. After #b
turns, deal #b5 damage to owner and transfer this effect to up to #b2 random enemies.

IsaacExt:SacredHeartPower.NAME: Sacred Heart
DESCRIPTIONS: Attack damage increased by #b130% in this combat.

IsaacExt:SoftheartedPower.NAME: Softhearted
DESCRIPTIONS: Put a #yGuilt in your hand after #b

IsaacExt:FranticPower.NAME: Frantic
DESCRIPTIONS: Increase the attack times of Baby Plum's diagonal attack by #b
. At the start of your turn, reduce #yFrantic by #b1. #yFrantic also decreases when you gain #yBlock.

IsaacExt:BarrageBlockadePower.NAME: Barrage Blockade
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever target receive attack damage from this enemy, apply #b1 #yFrantic.

IsaacExt:FamiliarBarrierPower.NAME: Familiar Barrier
DESCRIPTIONS: When any familiar alive, transfer #b%d%% of the #yattack damage to the first alive familiar (which can offset the overflow damage).

IsaacExt:LazarusRagsPower.NAME: Lazarus' Rags
DESCRIPTIONS: Attack damage increased by #b60% in this combat.

IsaacExt:PhantomPower.NAME: Phantom
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b%d cards played, transform to a random enemy that has appeared in the game. NL Occasionally reverts to its original form. All damage taken when not in its original form is reduced by #b50%%. NL (Play another #b%d cards and transform to a random enemy that has appeared in the game.)

IsaacExt:DerangedPower.NAME: Deranged
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b%d intents created, take an extra action. NL (Will take an extra action after #b%d intents created.)
